website_summaries.verdict: A simple, yet-effective way to make your fitness goals a reality.
pros: Choose between multiple configurations ranging from 6 to 36 pounds
Bar is made from solid metal and covered in foam for hand ergonomics
End caps are wear- and scuff-resistant
A fantastic way to improve endurance and strength without sacrificing mobility
cons: 30- and 36-pound bars are too expensive for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Shipped without any protection
customer_reviews.text: The Bar got shipped without any protection, It arrived all scuffed and marked with deep gouges in the foam. Was going to return it, but its Heavy and to much hassle, just going to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom ward

customer_reviews.title: ... have several padded weight bars and SPRI are the best! Padding is just right and well made
customer_reviews.text: We have several padded weight bars and SPRI are the best! Padding is just right and well made! You get what you pay for when it comes to exercise equipment!
customer_reviews.author: ejvwsc

customer_reviews.title: This does what it promises to do!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bar every day to practice lift form, and it works great. Exactly as described. If you like picking up heavy things and putting down, and want to get better at doing that the right way, this is the bar for you. Seriously though, the foam grip is really comfortable, and allows for multiple reps without breaking the callouses on my hands. Cool object.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thoman

customer_reviews.title: Best quality rubber weighted bar
customer_reviews.text: Best quality rubber weighted bar i’ve used. Other bars had grips that slipped on the bar or had irritating sand swishing around in the bar, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great product - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product - easy to use, so many ways to exercise with it - I searched for videos on YouTube and dozens came up - really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Kent

customer_reviews.title: Arrived USED
customer_reviews.text: This arrived clearly used and scuffed when it was purchased as a new item. It will still work but this is in very bad faith. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: M Foster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: about 6' long, a little heavier than I bargained for, still worth it
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth todd

customer_reviews.title: He seems happy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband to practice his golf swing and keep his shoulders and hips moving properly. He seems happy.
customer_reviews.author: AP Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Good easy workout tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought to strengthen my shiulder muscles and correct my posture...so far so good
customer_reviews.author: danielle jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Received Item with tears in foam
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in only a plastic bag covering. Had a tear in the outside foam. I can live with that overall, but what is not in the description in the 24 pound weight at least is the diameter of the bar itself. This is much thicker than a normal weight bar and difficult to handle for normal exercise. This makes this a simple no on its quality. I have used many of the weight bars in gyms and this is too thick
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I plan on getting a couple more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

product_meta.title: SPRI Weighted Bar
product_meta.description: These 4 to 6-foot long-weighted bars with foam cushioned padding give a new twist to your workout routines. Perfect for strength training, flexibility and balance in conjunction with various workout programs. Color-coded end caps indicate bar weight.
feature_bullets: Perfect for strength training, flexibility and body sculpting
Great for circuit training and Boot Camp conditioning
Foam cushioned padding for hand comfort grip
